name: Martín Fierro
description:
Dalton and Newman, creators of the classic 'Disgaea', the black and white action RPG, are teaming up to bring a new adventure to fans of the Castlevania series.
For the first time, players will be able to choose from six different characters to play as, including an elf, a frog, a human, a dark elf, a human, a devil, and a wolf. 'Disgaea', which is the latest in the series, has been confirmed for Xbox One, PS4, PC and just released for iOS. Dalton and Newman unveiled their new game yesterday at the Japan Koei Anime Festival, where the game was nominated for a New Game Award. It was also voted the game with the best soundtrack. Featured image from Outhouse Media.
